docs.description: Extra restrictor mask through which paths are strictly required to pass

docs.description: Make tracts stop at outer surfaces of the target ROIs

docs.description: Make tracts stop just before entering target surfaces

docs.description: Control logic connections among target ROIs per network

docs.description: Number of whole brain Monte Carlo iterations for mini-probabilistic tracking

docs.description: Set threshold for FA map or other WM proxy

docs.title: Max angle threshold (degrees)
docs.description: Set maximum angle for turning during propagation

docs.title: Min length threshold (mm)
docs.description: Set minimum physical length of tracts to keep

docs.title: Number of x seeds
docs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in x-direction

docs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in y-direction

docs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in z-direction

docs.description: Value for thresholding the fraction of tracks through a voxel for a given connection

docs.title: Seeds per voxel
docs.description: Number of seeds per voxel per Monte Carlo iteration

docs.title: Monte Carlo iterations
docs.description: Number of Monte Carlo iterations

docs.title: Extra parameter scaling flag
docs.description: Run three extra track parameter scalings for each connection

docs.title: Keep uncut at targets flag
docs.description: Keep entire track even if overshoots a target

docs.title: Dump ROIs mode
docs.description: Output individual masks of ROI connections

docs.title: No label table flag
docs.description: Turn off label table use in ROI dump output

docs.title: Consecutive labels flag
docs.description: DON'T apply numerical labels of original ROIs in dump output

docs.title: Posteriori flag
docs.description: Output individual files with number of tracks per voxel per pair

docs.title: Record origin flag
docs.description: Record dataset origin in header of *.trk file

docs.description: Output *.trk files for viewing in TrackVis

docs.title: Oppositize voxel order flag
docs.description: Oppositize voxel_order for TRK files

docs.description: Output files in *.nii.gz format

docs.description: Do not output INDIMAP and PAIRMAP volumes
